== Introduction ==
  This page gives general information on the device and user notes about their experience setting it up. If you need more help, please look to the WifiDocs page for more support channels.
 
== Device Info ==
** Manufacturer: Edimax
** Model #: EW7128G
** Revision:
** Device Type: PCI
** Chipset:
  <pre>
 Network controller: RaLink Ralink RT2500 802.11 Cardbus Reference C ard (rev 01)
        Subsystem: RaLink: Unknown device 2560
        Flags: bus master, slow devsel, latency 32, IRQ 193
        Memory at efefe000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=8K]
        Capabilities: [40] Power Management version 2
  </pre>
  
** Vendor/Device #: 1814:0201

=== Dapper 6.04 ===
==== Did it configure during install? ====

1. No

==== Did it work by just configuring network settings after install (out of box)? ====

1. Yes, but WPA requires special configuration through the terminal.

==== What driver did you use and ease of set up? ====

1. NO INPUT

1. NO INPUT

1. 
*** Instructions for setting up and configuring the device can be found at <nowiki>[[WifiDocs-Driver-RalinkRT2500]]</nowiki>. '''Do not''' try to configure WPA through wpasupplicant as described in WPAHowto.
